forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
As the early morning hours unfold in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle veil of partial cloudiness lingers overhead, adding a subdued charm to the urban landscape. With temperatures resting at around 48 degrees, the air is crisp, inviting a cozy embrace from your wardrobe. The gentle westerly breeze promises to shake off any lingering chill as it dances through the streets, whispering tales of the day to come.

The forecast heralds a delightful transition as the sun emerges, bathing the city in warmth and clarity. By midday, you'll find the high settling near 60 degrees, providing a pleasant contrast to the cool embrace of morning. As day morphs into afternoon, temperatures will soften to around 57, a reminder to carry a light layer just in case the breeze strengthens. With conditions ideal for a leisurely stroll, consider wandering through the nearby parks or along the waterfront, where the tranquility of the bay can refresh your spirit. Alternatively, a visit to a charming local café, nestled amid the bustling streets, pairs delightfully with a warm beverage, allowing you to savor the beauty that unfolds around you.
